Articles.Content:
Most planes and jets (of the fighter and experimental design) have an ejector seat, this would mean instead of attaching a heavy decoupler and parachutes all we would have to do would be to hit..... P and boom! blasted out to safety

also, after ejecting the option of a parachute would be nice, if your main chute on the capsule fails your kerbal can jump out below 10000 meters and [arachute down (much like yuri gagarin on his first space flight)

is there a mod and or plugin for this or will it be implemented later on?

As I do every time this comes up....

We need this ingame. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MOOSE

Can you think of anything more kerbal than getting inside a foam bag with a parachute, and strapping a rocket engine to your back to get out of orbit?
I saw a video on the MOOSE by scott manly looks cool, also with the amount of mods I have already I may just give the airplane parts what am I say, MODS AHOY!
